config.well.data.tooltip: Handle what fluids wells collect based on biome, and how much
config.well.onlyOnePerChunk: Limit to One Well Per Chunk
config.well.onlyOnePerChunk.tooltip: When set to true, all wells in the chunk will stop working while there's more than 1.
config.well.playSound.tooltip: Play the well cranking sound when someone takes fluid from a well.
config.well.tankCapacity.tooltip: How many millibuckets of a fluid can wells hold? Set to 0 to disable.
warn.well.onePerChunk: Already one other right side up well in the same chunk as this one!
warn.well.onePerChunkFlipped: Already one other upside down well in the same chunk as this one!
